settings.text: New Brand at Overkill - Ka_Yo_Prototype - Futuristic Outdoor Apparel

Today we are introducing Ka_Yo_Prototype, a new brand in Overkill's portfolio.

Outdoor clothing has become increasingly important in recent years. Gone are the days when only extreme mountaineers with the right equipment were the target group. Many useful features such as waterproof or wind-repellent materials are also popular daily. At the latest with the GORPCORE trend, many brands from the outdoor sector have also made a name for themselves in the lifestyle sector and gained popularity.

Ka Yo Prototype is a brand that takes outdoor clothing to a new level. Ka Yo has been a retailer from Sweden for years, specializing in this area and with all the popular outdoor brands in its portfolio. With extensive knowledge in this field, they had the perfect basis for establishing their brand. Ka_Yo_Prototype calls itself the future of outdoor clothing and you can see at first glance that real professionals are at work here. The brand has quickly become a pioneer in innovative outdoor, running, and trail equipment and offers a full range of clothing for these activities. Even though functionality is at the forefront of Ka Yo Prototype clothing, there is no shortage of appealing aesthetics. The focus is on durability, sustainable production, and well-thought-out designs. The collection is inspired by the beauty of the harsh Nordic nature and the weather that prevails there. The rather dark color palette of the garments is complemented by reflective elements. The Ka_Yo_Prototype collection comprises many different products, including trousers, jackets, vests as well as sweatshirts and accessories such as balaclavas or useful drinking bottles. Ka_Yo_Prototypes is now available in Germany exclusively at Overkill.
